title: Dyna-Mark
description: Save coding websites you found interesting or usefull

title: Ripple
description: This is a mock landing page for a fictional company called Ripple, dedicated to helping businesses achieve financial success through innovative solutions. The website is designed with a strong focus on UX/UI to provide an engaging user experience.

title: NBA Stats
description: Using this app you can a NBA team's Roster and Upcoming Games. You can also see games from the 2021 season.

title: Music Trivia
description: The goal of the game is to answer the questions promted to you correctly.
